title: Calories in Steak 'n Shake Burger
meta_description: Discover calories in steak n shake burger, including macros like protein and fat, plus tweaks and FAQs for your meal planning.
assumptions: Single plain steakburger with bun; no cheese, condiments, or extras; based on standard menu item.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and portion size. Check Steak 'n Shake app or menu for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A single Steak 'n Shake steakburger provides ~320 kcal and ~20 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a basic Steak 'n Shake burger?
faqs.a: About 320 kcal for a single plain steakburger.

faqs.q: What are the macros for calories in steak n shake?
faqs.a: Per burger: 20 g protein, 16 g fat, 28 g carbs.

faqs.q: Does adding cheese increase calories in steak n shake?
How much sodium in a Steak 'n Shake steakburger?
faqs.a: Around 700 mg per single plain burger.

faqs.q: Are Steak 'n Shake burgers high in trans fat?
faqs.a: Minimal at ~0.5 g per burger, but varies by preparation.
